headline: Ralph Lauren Announces Enterprise Leadership Changes; Bob Ranftl named Chief Operating Officer; Mercedes Abramo to join Company as Regional Chief Executive Officer, North America
summary: NEW YORK - Ralph Lauren Corporation announces the appointment of Bob Ranftl as Chief Operating Officer effective March 30, 2025, succeeding Jane Nielsen, whose planned departure was previously...
